sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz';
import Card from '../card.js';
import GridContainer from '../grid-container';
import GridItem from '../grid-item';

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"grid-item"}}>{`Grid Item`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The Grid Item give you options to control the Grid properties of the elements inside a GridContainer:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"padding-and-margin"}}>{`Padding and margin`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`the padding and margin properties give you control of their respective css properties.
You can use it in a string fashion or in a granular fashion`}</MDXTag>
<GridContainer template={{ column: '20%'.repeat(5) }} style={{border: 'solid black thin'}}>
  <GridItem margin="10px" style={{border: 'solid blue thin'}}>
    Grid Item 1 has *margin="10px"*
  </GridItem>
  <GridItem  style={{border: 'solid blue thin'}}>
    Grid Item 2
